kirby:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
kirby:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

kirby:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
kirby:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
kirby:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

kirby:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
kirby:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

kirby:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
kirby:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !kirby:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

kirby:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
kirby:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !kirby:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

kirby:Inhale.NAME: Inhale
kirby:Inhale.DESCRIPTION: kirby:Inhale an enemy below or equal to !M! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This enemy has too much HP.
